## Validators.IRecordOfValidatorOptions.onError property

If `onError` is `'fail'` (default), then the entire validation fails if any key or element cannot be validated. If `onError` is `'ignore'`<!-- -->, failing elements are silently ignored.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onError?: 'fail' | 'ignore';
```
